entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:36 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
